versions.name: v4.0 - Bug Fixes & Leaderboard Update
versions.description: Name-based leaderboard (multiple players per device), performance fixes, combo decay fix, particle limits

versions.name: v3.0 - Parallax Shader Update
versions.description: Parallax background shaders, native fullscreen resolution, dollar bill jump particles, shared online leaderboard

versions.name: v2.0 - Roguelike Update
versions.description: Dynamic lighting, roguelike progression, leaderboard, destructible objects

versions.name: v1.0 - Original Release
versions.description: Original Raanman Legends with bosses, particles, and fullscreen support
